name: 瓦尔特·科恩
bio_short: 奥地利裔美国理论物理学家和化学家。他因开创了“密度泛函理论”（DFT）（`dft_1964`），而获得了1998年的诺贝尔化学奖。这一理论彻底改变了计算化学和材料科学。
bio_short_en: An Austrian-American theoretical physicist and chemist. He was awarded the 1998 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for his development of 'Density Functional Theory' (DFT) (`dft_1964`), which revolutionized computational chemistry and materials science.
